Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.service

Klasse LogService

java.lang.Object
org.com.service.LogService
public class LogService extends Object
Singleton service for logging application events with different severity levels. Manages log creation, storage, and timestamp generation.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Umut
